comments.body: 0-shasanThanks for such a raffle. I have already sent the bitcoin (80k Satoshi) to your wallet. The bitcoin transaction id is: https://www.blockchain.com/explorer/transactions/btc/8a382a48f555ecb001055ee67a6a677bc0811648da34b54d9cb8ba356efe3f3bI wish you all the best.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: I am surprised to see that you have still now 13 tickets left and from this topic, only 1 spot has been taken and that is from me. What are you thinking? Will it be fulfilled or will you postpone the raffle? I think if this way running then it will take several months
